title: Delicate Diamond-studded Kada Bangles - Modern Elegance
features: Modern bangles, each thin and adorned with a line of diamonds. It has intricately designed features between each diamond to add to the texture. The diamond settings are modern bezel settings, making the diamonds appear larger and adding to the contemporary look of the bangles.
occasions: any occasion to complement a classic attire
description: Modern and minimalist design for everyday wear, High quality diamond ensure that these beautiful bangles can be the perfect addition to your look
